Description: Table of the kings of Syria and Egypt; with their names on tablets. Illustration to the Vulgate printed by Marion for Koberger in 1520-1. Woodcut
Producer name: Attributed to: Hans Springinklee (Placed with Schön)
Curator's comments: Illustration to Daniel 11. See also Curatorial Comment for 1927,0614.273.
Bibliographic references: Dodgson 1903, 1911 / Catalogue of Early German and Flemish Woodcuts in the BM, 2 vols (I.373.3) (Cf.)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: C G Boerner (sale CLIV Leipzig 4/6.v.1927/1159, 28M for 49 prints)
